sections.text: After January 1, 2014, no person or legal entity shall install a machine designed to use perchloroethylene as a cleaning agent for clothes or other fabrics.
After January 1, 2029, no person or legal entity shall use perchloroethlyene as a cleaning agent for clothes or other fabrics.
